extendedInfo.description: * Photo gallery of high quality "Greek Mythology Paintings" images .* Play "Greek Mythology Paintings" free Puzzles Game.* Set "Greek Mythology Paintings" Live Wallpaper.Here we show you these Greek Mythology Paintings Photography .  Every Paintings has its own story in Greek Mythology !Greek mythology is the body of myths and legends belonging to the ancient Greeks concerning their gods and heroes, the nature of the world, and the origins and significance of their own cult and ritual practices. They were a part of religion in ancient Greece. Modern scholars refer to and study the myths in an attempt to throw light on the religious and political institutions of Ancient Greece, its civilization, and to gain understanding of the nature of myth-making itself.Greek mythology is embodied explicitly in a large collection of narratives and implicitly in Greek representational arts, such as vase-paintings and votive gifts. Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of the world and details the lives and adventures of a wide variety of gods, goddesses, heroes, heroines, and mythological creatures. These accounts initially were disseminated in an oral-poetic tradition; today the Greek myths are known primarily from Greek literature.Menu option: - Set as Wallpaper , - Full Screen , - Save to SD .

reviews.title: Greek paintings
reviews.comment: Im not sure if they are all greek. Some of them look christian. Either way they are still interesting to look at.

reviews.title: Beware Malware!!!
reviews.comment: When using this app, Greek Mythological by Mobage, now rename Greek Mythology Paintings by ck20110701, it installs icons for other Apps to download and hijacks browser to download more apps.  This APP does not do a clean uninstall!!! To bad, I like it until I discovered it was the cause of problems mention.
reviews.author: PCden .net
